column6:
While Payback lays in a coma fighting for her life, the deeply dysfunctional secrets of the other True Believers come to light as they attempt to take an insidious bio-weapon off the black market. Along the way they encounter an angry Armadillo and a venal Madame Hydra, who has come to the party with a lethal agenda of her own!,2008,10
Parental Advisory ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Cary Bates | colorist:Rainier Beredo | inker:Paul Gulacy | letterer:Dave Lanphear
